com.github.bitseater.weather.desktop CC0-1.0 GPL-3.0+ bitseater@gmail Weather Weather Know the forecast of the next hours and days
Current weather, with information about temperature, pressure, wind speed and direction, sunrise and sunset. Show awesome maps with all the information. Switch between some maps distributors. Other features:
Forecast for next 18 hours.
Forecast for next five days.
Choose your units (metric or imperial).
Choose your city with maps info.
Watch awesome maps with weather info.
Now with System Tray Indicator.

We are working to improve our forecast application. New changes in this version are:
Change to meson build.
Add new translations: portuguese.
System tray indicator with weather icons.
Weather Maps: temperature, clouds, rain, pressure and wind speed.
Added two maps providers: Dark Sky and OpenWeatherMap.
